data.text: Hanchu, Jisua'n Jericho lûtin apala.
Mahan sumrusuongpungei ulientak a riming Zacchaeus an ti mineipa a oma.
Jisua hah i-anga mi mini, mu rang a nuoma, ania miriem dungbong ania, mipui tamrai sikin mu thei maka.

Hanchu Jisua'n ma lampui a hongvun rang sikin, mipui moton tieng Jisua mu rangin a tâna, Theichangpui19:4: Theichangpui ei ti hih English chongin sycamore an tia, apanga amara kop ngâi jât ania theichang ranga lien uol ani. kunga a kala.
Jisua'n ha mun a hong phâka anîn chu a tanga a kôma, “Zacchaeus juong chum lai roh, avien chu ni ina kêng ku tung ngêt rang,” a tia.
Zacchaeus hah innot takin a juong chuma, râisân takin a ina a mintung zoi.
Mipui a mu ngei nâmin an chiera, “Mi nunsie ina kêng tung rangin a se rek zoi so,” an tia.
Hanchu, Zacchaeus ândinga, Pumapa kôma, “Rangâi roh, O Pu! Ke neinun in-ang ânriengngei pêk ka ta, hanchu tutu, lei huong ta khom inlang, abâk minlîn thuon nôk ki tih,” a tia.
Jisua'n a kôma, “Avien, hi ina hin sanminringna a tung zoi, hi mi khom hih Abraham richi ani sikin.
Miriem Nâipasal hih ânmangngei roka sanminring rang piela juong ani,”19:10: Mat 18:11 a tia.
Hanchu, ha a chongril an rangâi lâiin Jerusalem anâi zoi sik le Pathien Rêngram juong inlang kelen ranga an sabei sikin chongmintêk a misîra. 19:11-27: Mat 25:14-30
Hi chong hih a rila, “Mi lien inkhatin rêng changna roi hong lâka hongkîr nôk rangin ram lâtaka a sea.
A se rangtôn chu a suokngei sôm a koia, rângkachak sumdâr a pêk chita, ‘ko hong nôk mâka lei muphung roi’ a tia.
Ania, a ram mingeiin an hengpaia, a nûka palâi an tîra, ‘Hi mi hih kin rêng rangin nuom makme an ti,’” a tia.
Hanchu, rêng an minchang zoiin a hongkîr nôka, idodôr mo an lei muphung rekel rangin a suokngei hah a makunga a koitûpa.
Amotontakpu a honga, “O, Pu, mina pêk hah rângkachak sumdâr sômin ku muphung,” a tia.
A kôma, “No tho min sa, tîrlâm sa ni ni, neinun tômte chunga iem no om sikin, kholien sôm ngei chunga ulienin nang min chang ki tih,” a tipea.
A tîrlâm inikna a honga a kôma, “O Pu, inkhat mina pêk hah rângkachak sumdâr rangngan ku muphung,” a tia.
Hanchu, ama kôma han, “Nang khom khopuilien rangnga ngei chunga ulienin om roh,” a tipea.
Hanchu, adang a honga, “O Pu, en ta, na rângkachak sumdâr mi na pêk hah mâihûinân ku sûna ka darchien.
Mi inngar tak nini sikin nang ki chi ani. Na darloi khom na lâka, nu tuloi khom na ât ngâi” a tia.
A kôma, tîrlâm saloi ni ni, no chong nanâkin theiloi nang amintum. Mi inngar tak ki nia, ka darloi khom ka lâk ngâia, ku tuloi khom ka ât ngâi ni rieta,
anînte, ithomo ku sum hih a pungna ina ne lei dar loi, ko hong nôka hin apung leh ka man rang kêng ani, a tia.
Hanchu, a kôla inding ngei kôma han, “A rângkachak sumdâr lâk pe ungla, sôm adônpu pêk roi,” a tia.
Hanchu, ama'n a kôma, “O Pu, anîn chu rângkachak sumdâr sôm a dôn mo ka ta,” an tia.
19:26: Mat 13:12; Mk 4:25; Luk 8:18Ama han an kôma, “Nangni ki ril, tutu a nei viet kai chu pêk mintam uol nîng a ta, a nei loi kai chu ai dôn viete khom hah lâk pe rip nîng a tih,” a tia.
“Hi ka râlngei, an rêng ranga minuom loi kai chu hong tuong ungla ka makunga that roi a ti” a tia.
Ma chong hah a misîr zoiin chu Jerusalem panin moton ânsa.
Bethphage le Bethany khuo kôl Olive muol a tungin chu, an motona a ruoisi inik a tîra,
“nin motona khuoa son vase ungla, nin lûtin, tute la chuongna ngâi loi sakuording te inthung mûng nin tih, sût ungla hin hongkai roi.
Tukhomin ithomo nin sût tiin an rekelin chu, Pumapa'n a nâng ani tipe roi,” a tia.
Hanchu, an sea Pumapa'n a ti lam ang takin an va mua,
Sakuordingte an sûtin chu a pumangeiin, “Ithomo nin sût?” an tia.
Hanchu an kôma, “Pumapa'n19:34 a pu; nônchu a pumapa. ai nâng ani,” an tia.
Sakuording te hah Jisua kôma an kaia, a chunga an puonngei an dâpa, Jisua an min chuonga.
A sena rang lampuia khom an puonngei an dâp tira.
Hanchu, Jerusalem tung ranga Olive muol chum rangin chu a ruoisingeiin a sininkhêl sin an mu sikin rôl inring takin Pathien an minpâka.
19:38: Lap 118:26 “Pumapa riminga hong rêngpa chu Pathien'n satvur rese, invâna inngêina lêngin Pathien roiinpui rese,” an tia.
Mipui lâia Pharisee senkhatin Jisua kôma, “Minchupu, nu ruoisingei dâirek rangin ril roh,” an tia.
Jisua'n an kôma, “Nangni ki ril, hi ngei hih an dâirekin chu, lungngei tena luo an iniek rang ani,” tiin a thuona.
Hanchu, an tung rangtôn chu, khopui hah a mua a châa.
“Ratha'nngamna chong hih avienni tena luo hin ni riet nita senla chu O! Aniatate mu thei khâi mak chea.
Zora hongtung a tih, na râlngeiin nu rukul bula pil minpôngin nang huolvêl an ta, kil tina nang khap tit an tih.
Nu rukul sûnga ni mingei le nang minmang chit an tih, nu sûnga lung inchuon reng hôi no ni ngei; nang minring ranga Pathien juonglâi ni riet loi sikin,” a tia.
Hanchu, Jisua'n Biekina ava lûta, neinun juorngei hah a rujûla.
19:46: Isa 56:7; Jer 7:11 An kôma, “Lekhabua miziekin Pathien'n, Ki in chu chubai thona in tîng an tih, a tia. Ania nangni rêkin chu inrungei khurin kêng nin sin hi,” a tipe ngeia.
Jisua'n anîngtin Biekina a ril ngei ngâia. Ochaisingei, Balam minchupungei le mipui ruoipungeiin that rang an bôka.
Hannisenla, mipui ngeiin ningsiet taka a chongril an rangâia bâikhat luo minsam rang an nuom ngâiloi sikin, a tho rang lam man mak ngei.
